requestBody.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse API Trace
Customer one signs up and logs in Snapshot

view.title: Customer one signs up and logs in
view.subtitle: Primary customer account created.

data.title: Customer one signs up and logs in Snapshot

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

requestBody.title: Create and publish offer version Snapshot

data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.
